Content.Text:
<FACE_LUTZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there, <MYNAME>! Seeing you wandering
around here at this time of day, I'm guessing you
aren't busy, right?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Right now, I'm trying to observe some animals. I
heard there are bunnies around here.
<PAGE>
If you're not doing anything else, could you help
me look for them?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um...<MYNAME>? You have cows on your
farm, right?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I...well, I'd like to ask a favor.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can I see your cows?
Sure! Follow me.
No, you can't.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Really? I can? Hooray!
<PAGE>
I've always wanted to see a cow up close.
They're so big!

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
No? Are you sure? Can't I just have a teensy little
peek? Pleeeease?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Your farm isn't far from here, right? I won't take
too long. I promise.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pleeease?
Oh, okay. Come on.
No means no.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Well, I guess you're pretty busy, huh? All right,
fine. I won't bother you about it anymore.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Guess I'll see if I can find those bunnies myself.
Don't interrupt me, or you might scare them off.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Whoa! A cow!

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Wow! They're really huge!

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm... Does that mean it's happy?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, um...is it all right if I touch it?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Wow! This is so neat! The cow really seems
happy!

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cows are really big, but they're really cute, too.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Uh-oh. I should probably get back. Thanks for
letting me come over and see your farm,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It was pretty fun!

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, by the way...do you think you could keep
this secret from my mom?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mom's not exactly fond of animals, so she'd
throw a fit if she found out I was petting cows.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't want her to worry that I was putting
myself in danger or something. Can you keep
my secret?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks! I'll be heading back now.
